Package io.nem.symbol.core.crypto

Class KeyPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.core.crypto.KeyPair
  • public class KeyPair
extends java.lang.Object
    It represents an asymmetric private/public encryption key. Public key is always present. Private key may not be present. If the private key is not preset, the key cannot be used to decrypt values.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • random

        public static KeyPair random()
        Creates a random key pair using the default engine.
        Returns:
        a KeyPair with both public and private keys.

      • random

        public static KeyPair random​(CryptoEngine engine)
        Creates a random key pair using the provided engine.
        Parameters:
        engine - the engine.
        Returns:
        a KeyPair with both public and private keys.

      • fromPrivate

        public static KeyPair fromPrivate​(PrivateKey privateKey,
                                  CryptoEngine engine)
        Creates a key pair around a private key. The public key is calculated from the private key.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The private key.
        engine - the engine.
        Returns:
        a KeyPair with both public and private keys.

      • onlyPublic

        public static KeyPair onlyPublic​(PublicKey publicKey)
        Creates a pair that only holds a public key using the default engine. It is good to encrypt but cannot decrypt values.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The public key.
        Returns:
        a KeyPair with just the public key.

      • onlyPublic

        public static KeyPair onlyPublic​(PublicKey publicKey,
                                 CryptoEngine engine)
        Creates a pair that only holds a public key. It is good to encrypt but cannot decrypt values.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The public key.
        engine - the engine.
        Returns:
        a KeyPair with just the public key.

      • fromPrivate

        public static KeyPair fromPrivate​(PrivateKey privateKey)
        Creates a key pair around a private key using the default engine. The public key is calculated from the private key.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The private key.
        Returns:
        a KeyPair with both public and private keys.

      • getPrivateKey

        public PrivateKey getPrivateKey()
        Gets the private key.
        Returns:
        The private key raising an IllegalStateException if the private key hasn't been set.

      • getPublicKey

        public PublicKey getPublicKey()
        Gets the public key.
        Returns:
        the public key. Never null.

      • hasPrivateKey

        public boolean hasPrivateKey()
        Determines if the current key pair has a private key.
        Returns:
        true if the current key pair has a private key.
